arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلّٰهِ مَا فِى السَّمٰوٰتِ وَمَا فِى الْاَرْضِۚ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيْزُ الْحَكِيْمُ
transliteration_en: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fisamaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
transliteration_id: Sabbaḥa lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
translation_en: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
translation_id: Apa yang ada di langit dan apa yang ada di bumi bertasbih kepada Allah. Dialah Yang Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Bijaksana.

arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لِمَ تَقُوْلُوْنَ مَا لَا تَفْعَلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo lima taqooloona maa laa taf'aloon
transliteration_id: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lima taqūlūna mā lā taf‘alūn(a).
translation_en: O you who have believed, why do you say what you do not do?
translation_id: Wahai orang-orang yang beriman, mengapa kamu mengatakan sesuatu yang tidak kamu kerjakan?

arabic: كَبُرَ مَقْتًا عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ اَنْ تَقُوْلُوْا مَا لَا تَفْعَلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Kabura maqtan 'indal laahi an taqooloo maa laa taf'aloon
transliteration_id: Kabura maqtan ‘indallāhi an taqūlū mā lā taf‘alūn(a).
translation_en: Great is hatred in the sight of Allah that you say what you do not do.
translation_id: Sangat besarlah kemurkaan di sisi Allah bahwa kamu mengatakan apa yang tidak kamu kerjakan.

arabic: اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يُحِبُّ الَّذِيْنَ يُقَاتِلُوْنَ فِيْ سَبِيْلِهٖ صَفًّا كَاَنَّهُمْ بُنْيَانٌ مَّرْصُوْصٌ
transliteration_en: Innal laaha yuhibbul lazeena yuqaatiloona fee sabeelihee saffan kaannahum bunyaanum marsoos
transliteration_id: Innallāha yuḥibbul-lażīna yuqātilūna fī sabīlihī ṣaffan ka'annahum bun-yānum marṣūṣ(un).
translation_en: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in a row as though they are a [single] structure joined firmly.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Allah mencintai orang-orang yang berperang di jalan-Nya dalam satu barisan, seakan-akan mereka suatu bangunan yang tersusun kukuh.

arabic: وَاِذْ قَالَ مُوْسٰى لِقَوْمِهٖ يٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تُؤْذُوْنَنِيْ وَقَدْ تَّعْلَمُوْنَ اَنِّيْ رَسُوْلُ اللّٰهِ اِلَيْكُمْۗ فَلَمَّا زَاغُوْٓا اَزَاغَ اللّٰهُ قُلُوْبَهُمْۗ وَاللّٰهُ لَا يَهْدِى الْقَوْمَ الْفٰسِقِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa iz qaala Moosa liqawmihee yaa qawmi lima tu'zoonanee wa qat ta'lamoona annee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum falammaa zaaghooo azaaghal laahu quloobahum; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen
transliteration_id: Wa iż qāla mūsā liqaumihī yā qaumi lima tu'żūnanī wa qad ta‘lamūna annī rasūlullāhi ilaikum, falammā zāgū azāgallāhu qulūbahum, wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumal-fāsiqīn(a).
translation_en: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Moses said to his people, "O my people, why do you harm me while you certainly know that I am the messenger of Allah to you?" And when they deviated, Allah caused their hearts to deviate. And Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.
translation_id: (Ingatlah) ketika Musa berkata kepada kaumnya, “Wahai kaumku, mengapa kamu menyakitiku? Padahal, kamu sungguh mengetahui bahwa aku adalah utusan Allah kepadamu.” Maka, ketika mereka berpaling (dari perintah Allah), Allah memalingkan hati mereka (dari kebenaran). Allah tidak memberi petunjuk kepada kaum yang fasik.

arabic: وَاِذْ قَالَ عِيْسَى ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ يٰبَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ اِنِّيْ رَسُوْلُ اللّٰهِ اِلَيْكُمْ مُّصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيَّ مِنَ التَّوْرٰىةِ وَمُبَشِّرًاۢ بِرَسُوْلٍ يَّأْتِيْ مِنْۢ بَعْدِى اسْمُهٗٓ اَحْمَدُۗ فَلَمَّا جَاۤءَهُمْ بِالْبَيِّنٰتِ قَالُوْا هٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
transliteration_en: Wa iz qaala 'Eesab-nu-Mayama yaa Banee Israaa'eela innee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum musaddiqal limaa baina yadayya minat Tawraati wa mubashshiram bi Rasooliny yaatee mim ba'dis muhooo Ahmad; falammaa jaaa'ahum bil baiyinaati qaaloo haazaa sihrum mubeen
transliteration_id: Wa iż qāla ‘īsabnu maryama yā banī isrā'īla innī rasūlullāhi ilaikum muṣaddiqal limā baina yadayya minat-taurāti wa mubasysyiram birasūliy ya'tī mim ba‘dismuhū aḥmad(u), falammā jā'ahum bil-bayyināti qālū hāżā siḥrum mubīn(un).
translation_en: And [mention] when Jesus, the son of Mary, said, "O children of Israel, indeed I am the messenger of Allah to you confirming what came before me of the Torah and bringing good tidings of a messenger to come after me, whose name is Ahmad." But when he came to them with clear evidences, they said, "This is obvious magic."
translation_id: (Ingatlah) ketika Isa putra Maryam berkata, “Wahai Bani Israil, sesungguhnya aku adalah utusan Allah kepadamu untuk membenarkan kitab (yang turun) sebelumku, yaitu Taurat, dan memberi kabar gembira tentang seorang utusan Allah yang akan datang setelahku yang namanya Ahmad (Nabi Muhammad).” Akan tetapi, ketika utusan itu datang kepada mereka dengan membawa bukti-bukti yang nyata, mereka berkata, “Ini adalah sihir yang nyata.”

arabic: وَمَنْ اَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ افْتَرٰى عَلَى اللّٰهِ الْكَذِبَ وَهُوَ يُدْعٰىٓ اِلَى الْاِسْلَامِۗ وَاللّٰهُ لَا يَهْدِى الْقَوْمَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa man azlamu mimma nif taraa 'alal laahil kaziba wa huwa yad'aaa ilal Islaam; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen
transliteration_id: Wa man aẓlamu mimmaniftarā ‘alallāhil-każiba wa huwa yud‘ā ilal-islām(i), wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
translation_en: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah untruth while he is being invited to Islam. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
translation_id: Siapakah yang lebih zalim daripada orang yang mengada-adakan kebohongan terhadap Allah, padahal dia diseru kepada (agama) Islam? Allah tidak memberi petunjuk kepada kaum yang zalim.

arabic: يُرِيْدُوْنَ لِيُطْفِـُٔوْا نُوْرَ اللّٰهِ بِاَفْوَاهِهِمْۗ وَاللّٰهُ مُتِمُّ نُوْرِهٖ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الْكٰفِرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Yureedoona liyutfi'oo nooral laahi bi afwaahimim wallaahu mutimmu noorihee wa law karihal kaafiroon
transliteration_id: Yurīdūna liyuṭfi'ū nūrallāhi bi'afwāhihim, wallāhu mutimmu nūrihī wa lau karihal-kāfirūn(a).
translation_en: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah will perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it.
translation_id: Mereka hendak memadamkan cahaya (agama) Allah dengan mulut mereka, sedangkan Allah tetap menyempurnakan cahaya-Nya walaupun orang-orang kafir tidak menyukai.

arabic: هُوَ الَّذِيْٓ اَرْسَلَ رَسُوْلَهٗ بِالْهُدٰى وَدِيْنِ الْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهٗ عَلَى الدِّيْنِ كُلِّهٖۙ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الْمُشْرِكُوْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Huwal lazee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa wa deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullihee wa law karihal mushrikoon
transliteration_id: Wa huwal-lażī arsala rasūlahū bil-hudā wa dīnil-ḥaqqi  liyuẓhirahū ‘alad-dīni kullih(ī), wa lau karihal-musyrikūn(a).
translation_en: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although those who associate others with Allah dislike it.
translation_id: Dialah yang mengutus Rasul-Nya dengan (membawa) petunjuk dan agama yang benar agar Dia mengunggulkannya atas semua agama walaupun orang-orang musyrik tidak menyukai.

arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا هَلْ اَدُلُّكُمْ عَلٰى تِجَارَةٍ تُنْجِيْكُمْ مِّنْ عَذَابٍ اَلِيْمٍ
transliteration_en: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aammano hal adullukum 'alaa tijaaratin tunjeekum min 'azaabin aleem
transliteration_id: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū hal adullukum ‘alā tijāratin tunjīkum min ‘ażābin alīm(in).
translation_en: O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment?
translation_id: Wahai orang-orang yang beriman, maukah kamu Aku tunjukkan suatu perdagangan yang (dapat) menyelamatkan kamu dari azab yang pedih?

arabic: تُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَرَسُوْلِهٖ وَتُجَاهِدُوْنَ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ بِاَمْوَالِكُمْ وَاَنْفُسِكُمْۗ ذٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُوْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Tu'minoona billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa tujaahidoona fee sabeelil laahi bi amwaalikum wa anfusikum; zaalikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon
transliteration_id: Tu'minūna billāhi wa rasūlihī wa tujāhidūna fī sabīlillāhi bi'amwālikum wa anfusikum, żālikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
translation_en: [It is that] you believe in Allah and His Messenger and strive in the cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives. That is best for you, if you should know.
translation_id: (Caranya) kamu beriman kepada Allah dan Rasul-Nya dan berjihad di jalan Allah dengan harta dan jiwamu. Yang demikian itu lebih baik bagimu jika kamu mengetahui.

arabic: يَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ذُنُوْبَكُمْ وَيُدْخِلْكُمْ جَنّٰتٍ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ وَمَسٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةً فِيْ جَنّٰتِ عَدْنٍۗ ذٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيْمُۙ
transliteration_en: Yaghfir lakum zunoobakum wa yudkhilkum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wa masaakina taiyibatan fee Jannaati 'Ad; zaalikal fawzul 'Azeem
transliteration_id: Yagfir lakum żunūbakum wa yudkhilkum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru wa masākina ṭayyibatan fī jannāti ‘adn(in), żālikal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
translation_en: He will forgive for you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence. That is the great attainment.
translation_id: (Jika kamu beriman dan berjihad,) niscaya Allah mengampuni dosa-dosamu dan memasukkanmu ke dalam surga yang mengalir di bawahnya sungai-sungai dan ke tempat-tempat tinggal yang baik di dalam surga ‘Adn. Itulah kemenangan yang agung.

arabic: وَاُخْرٰى تُحِبُّوْنَهَاۗ نَصْرٌ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ وَفَتْحٌ قَرِيْبٌۗ وَبَشِّرِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa ukhraa tuhibboonahaa nasrum minal laahi wa fat hun qaree; wa bashshiril mu 'mineen
transliteration_id: Wa ukhrā tuḥibbūnahā, naṣrum minallāhi wa fatḥun qarīb(un), wa basysyiril-mu'minīn(a).
translation_en: And [you will obtain] another [favor] that you love - victory from Allah and an imminent conquest; and give good tidings to the believers.
translation_id: (Ada balasan) lain yang kamu sukai, (yaitu) pertolongan dari Allah dan kemenangan yang dekat (waktunya). Sampaikanlah berita gembira kepada orang-orang mukmin.

arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا كُوْنُوْٓا اَنْصَارَ اللّٰهِ كَمَا قَالَ عِيْسَى ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ لِلْحَوَارِيّٖنَ مَنْ اَنْصَارِيْٓ اِلَى اللّٰهِ ۗقَالَ الْحَوَارِيُّوْنَ نَحْنُ اَنْصَارُ اللّٰهِ فَاٰمَنَتْ طَّاۤىِٕفَةٌ مِّنْۢ بَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ وَكَفَرَتْ طَّاۤىِٕفَةٌ ۚفَاَيَّدْنَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا عَلٰى عَدُوِّهِمْ فَاَصْبَحُوْا ظٰهِرِيْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamaanoo koonooo ansaaral laahi kamaa qaala 'Eesab-nu-Maryama lil Hawaariyyeena man ansaareee ilal laah; qaalal Hawaariyyoona nahnu ansaa rul laahi fa aamanat taaa'ifatum mim Bannee Israaa'eela wa kafarat taaa'ifatun fa ayyadnal lazeena aammanoo 'alaa 'aduwwihim fa asbahoo zaahireen
transliteration_id: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū kūnū anṣārallāhi kamā qāla ‘īsabnu maryama lil-ḥawāriyyīna man anṣārī ilallāh(i), qālal-ḥawāriyyūna naḥnu anṣārullāhi fa'āmanaṭ-ṭā'ifatum mim banī isrā'īla wa kafaraṭ-ṭā'ifah(tun), fa'ayyadnal-lażīna āmanū ‘alā ‘aduwwihim fa'aṣbaḥū ẓāhirīn(a).
translation_en: O you who have believed, be supporters of Allah, as when Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, "Who are my supporters for Allah?" The disciples said, "We are supporters of Allah." And a faction of the Children of Israel believed and a faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant.
translation_id: Wahai orang-orang yang beriman, jadilah penolong-penolong (agama) Allah sebagaimana Isa putra Maryam berkata kepada pengikut-pengikutnya yang setia, “Siapakah para penolongku menuju kepada (pertolongan) Allah?” Para pengikutnya yang setia itu berkata, “Kamilah penolong-penolong (agama) Allah.” Maka, segolongan dari Bani Israil beriman dan segolongan (yang lain) kufur. Lalu, Kami menguatkan orang-orang yang beriman menghadapi musuh-musuh mereka sehingga menjadi orang-orang yang menang.
